name: Not a Shooter
description:
In Not a Shooter you have to make use of your enemies' bullets to kill them. The game has only a couple levels for now but it will be soon updated.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys - Move
  • R - Restart
  • Spacebar - Proceed to next level

Note: This game has been developed in under two days for the GMTK 2018 Game Jam
